title: Genomic Instability: Interplay between DNA replication, recombination and repair
abstractText: We publish the results of our studies in high quality, peer-reviewed scientific journals. The principal investigator is also regularly invited to speak at major international conferences, to write reviews and to give seminars at universities and research units. Members of the group have also given presentations on aspects of DNA damage and cancer at 6th form Summer Schools and Open Days, and to school 6th form biology classes. Personal web pages provide general information about our research.
